definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Da 2:9 time (Targum id., Syr. 9edono0, perh. loan-word from As. adannu, fixed, appointed, or definite, time; [Ar. 9d=0n prob. Aram. loan-wd., Schwally:ZMG liii (1899), 197]);—abs. ´[[ע]]: Da 7:12 +; emph. [[עִדָּנׇא]] Da 2:8 +; pl. abs. [[עִדָּנִין]] Da 4:13 +, emph. [[עִדָּנַיׇּא]] Da 2:21;—
in gen., time, as duration Da 2:8, Da 7:12; involving specif. conditions Da 2:9, Da 2:21; (point of) time Da 3:5, Da 3:15.

definite time, = year (as mod. Gk. cro/nov, v. EASophocles:1173): ´[[שִׁבְעָה ע]]: = seven years, Da 4:13, Da 4:20, Da 4:22, Da 4:29; [[עִדָּן וְעִדָּנִין וּפְלַג עִדָּן]] Da 7:25 (i.e. 3 1/2 years, v. Dr; perhaps read du. for pl., cf. Bev Gunk:Schöpf. 201).
